Name: Grand Berry
Ingredients: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: POUR cranberry juice into ice-filled glass to half fill. ADD lime juice and Grand Marnier.
Review: Pouring the cranberry before the liqueur makes this drink easier to mix due to the ingredients specific gravities. The liqueur falls through the juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Grand Berry contains 180 calories
